title-group.article-title: Environmental Input-Output Life Cycle Analysis: A Summary of Results Including a Comparison with the SETAC Approach

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1999 Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: We compare two methods for life cycle analysis: the conventional SETAC-EPA approach and Economic InputOutput Life Cycle Analysis (EIO-LCA). The methods are compared for steel versus plastic fuel tank systems and for the entire life cycle of an automobile, from materials extraction to end of life. The EIO-LCA method gives comparable results for the data common to the two methods. EIO-LCA gives more detailed data, specifies the economy-wide implications, and is much quicker and less expensive to implement.
